About Me

Who am I?

I have been a dental assistant since June of 2022. I have gained valuable technical skills such as learning how to pour dental models and setting up patient rooms quickly. I really enjoy working with my co-workers and boss.

I have been coding discord bots for over a year. This has allowed me to gain knowledge with the Discord.py and Eris.js libraries. Although most of my bots have been created for fun, in December of 2022 I participated in the Snow Codes Bot Jam and placed 7th overall with this bot.

I am inevitable.
